teacher_info.intro: Hi! Isn’t it a nice day? I assume we don’t know each other yet so let’s get acquainted.  Let me introduce myself- permit me - Mr. Eugene Uvarov. A patient and passionate Russian language teacher, language learner and family man. Fond of foreign languages, I am here to teach you mine. Apart from languages, I am pretty good at chess, film editing and able to solve Rubik’s Cube sub 30 sec. I am also a poet and when it comes to poetry I express my thoughts in rhymed lines. Should you have any questions, please message me! Peace out!
teacher_info.short_signature: 6+ years of teaching experience are to help you gain more confidence when speaking Russian
teacher_info.introduction:
Привет! My name is Eugene.  I am a certified teacher of the Russian as a Foreign Language.  I’ve been teaching students from all over the world from the US of A to Southeast Asia for two years now. I’ve seen a lot! Over 1 000+ completed lessons taught me:  no matter who you are, no matter where you are from, no matter what language you speak and what your occupation is – you can learn to speak Russian. A foreign language is a wealth that nobody can take out of you. Let us earn this wealth together. I will be happy to meet you at our class. I hope someday this place will be the second home for you. See you very soon! Bye!

To my future students:  at our classes we do both formal lessons/informal tutoring during which we develop your skills in the language. I work both with advanced learners and beginners using different methods of teaching according to student’s purposes.  We do lots of colloquial, reading, writing and listening practice. My courses can be divided into courses for beginners (A1-A2), intermediate courses (B1), advanced courses (B2-C1) and TORFL exam preparation courses.  If you are at C2 level – don’t worry, we will find some topic to speak on. I have master’s degree in economics, bachelor’s degree in law and pedagogy.  We will definitely find something common, won’t we?  I am fond of beginners, really. Yesterday they knew nothing, today they speak Russian.  Here we have well-structured lessons and gradually step by step learn Russian from abs to fluent conversation.  Each lesson has its structure and ends with homework.  
I am also a passionate language learner and I very well understand what you feel when learning Russian. Russian is difficult? What you’re going to say about Chinese or Vietnamese than?! No worries let us try Russian!
Do you want to speak Russian? Take a class and we begin. Поехали!

! Cancellation policy !

A student pays for the lesson; if he missed the lesson; if he were more than 20 minutes late.

teacher_info.about_teacher: My academic background is here. I am a certified teacher of Russian as a Foreign Language, completed the Moscow State University’s courses. I also have a bachelor’s degree in general pedagogy of Tula State University. Apart from teaching, I was awarded a master’s degree in economics and bachelor’s in law by Tula State University. This is what motivates me to teach: Yesterday he came and wasn't able to speak a word in Russian. Tomorrow he’ll be able to tell stories. Try it.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I am an informal professional teacher. This is what determines my style of teaching. Yes, we use textbooks but only as a structure. Textbooks are only paper. They don’t speak but we will. We speak all the time during the class. We cover all kind of activities such as Speaking, Listening, Reading and Writing. But Writing is the thing you’ll be asked to do at home as your homework.  No homework - divide your progress by ten. It’s sad but a reality. Let’s learn the language. Ready?

pro_course_detail.title: 8$ per Professional Lesson For a Year | Special Offer (for Highly Motivated Only)
pro_course_detail.description:
Hello my dear highly motivated students. In this course for highly motivated students I am happy to make you an offer which is hard to refuse.  As a teacher I am interested in students who are ready to learn Russian in a long - term perspective. I want sustainable, persistent students obstinately overcoming the difficulties they face when learning Russian. 

To help you increase your motivation and to emphasize the meaning of persistence in language learning I am here to offer you a special course and that's what this course is about. 

As you may have noticed the initial price of the course is 30$ per hour. Let me tell you why. I put the high initial price to avoid not motivated students who want just to mess around the language.  The coolest thing here is that the more you take classes the less price for the professional lesson you have. This is how it works. We start at 30$ and then decrease the price by 1$ each lesson. So the second lesson will be 29$, the third - 28$. After 20 lessons the price will be 10$, after 22 lessons - only 8$! Furthermore I will go further and hold the price at 8$ for the next year! So you will be enjoying the price during the whole year! 

Let me explain you what it means in numbers. My current rate for a professional lesson is 13.2 $ per hour. If we have a lesson twice a week during the year, you're going to spend 13.2 x96=1267$ which is a lot! Let's do some math: (30+29...+8) +(73 x 8) = 964$. Eventually, you are going to save 246$ using this course!   

This course is a special offer which is available during one year. After this date the price is going to be 11$ per lesson. The offer is available with the following conditions: 1) students level: A1- A2; lessons must be taken twice a week; if a student misses a lesson/comes unprepared the price will be increased by 1$; If a student misses two weeks/comes unprepared twice, the price will be returned to its initial state.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello everyone! My name is Anna:) 
I was born and live in Russia, Petrozavodsk (Karelia). 

I have a bachelor’s degree in Russian philology and a master’s degree in teaching of Russian as a foreign language. I love the Russian language very much, so I am glad to share my knowledge with other people. 

In my free time I like to swim, play billiards and travel. My passion is music so I collect CDs of my favorite artists. My life is connected with languages ​​and literature, so I read a lot of books. I'm interested in modern literature, especially in postmodernism and intellectual prose. 

I love talking to people about everything from religion to memes to stupid jokes so we can get along! :)

I work with adults, teenagers and children. I am friendly and patient, don't require to do homework (although I advise it for better progress). I always keep in touch with students, chat with them and share interesting and funny facts about Russia.

My education/training:
•	Bachelor's d.: Petrozavodsk State University “Applied philology”
•	Master's d.: Nizhny Novgorod Dobrolyubov State Linguistic University “Technologies for teaching Russian as a foreign language”
•	Professional retraining: Moscow State University “Methods of teaching Russian as a foreign language for children”

I have experience of working in school and university with foreign students of the preparatory faculty.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
The lessons will be a space for you to practice your conversational skills. Lessons are built depending on your goals. I will help you with speaking, writing, listening and reading for any level. If you are interested in Russian literature, we can work with original texts by authors that are of interest to you.

I always show the realities of Russia and don't hesitate to discuss any questions about Russian history, politics and culture. I show the material through jokes, funny associations and memes, because the most important thing in the lesson is the atmosphere. 

My teaching interest is children and bilinguals. With my young students I use Russian songs, poems, fairy tales and cartoons.

teacher_info.introduction:
Intensive, Interactive, and Engaging! 

Do you want to visit Russia or Ukraine? 
Do you want to understand Russians speaking and they understand you?
Are you hoping to understand classic literary texts better?

I can help you with any of those things, and much more!  I have a master degree in Russian and Ukrainian languages and literature, as well as teaching Russian and Ukrainian as a foreign languages. I have been teaching high-level Russian and Ukrainian skills online for several years and have the experience, knowledge and empathy necessary to make sure you reach your goals the way you want to. 

My sessions are always 100% adapted to your needs. No matter what your level is, if you are beginner or advanced, no matter what your goal is or how difficult it might be to reach, I can work with you every step of the way until you speak like a native, understand the book or anything else.

I am a teacher who loves to make learning fun! I also try to make complex things easy to comprehend. At the same time, I am very serious about helping the students improve. If you are struggling with a certain course, I am always here for you.

I like history of Mesopotamia, paleontology and hitchhiking. I participate in many volunteering activities and I am about to start teaching literature in prisons. When I travel I love to discover places which are ugly to some but beautiful to me. I am interested in this special type of beauty which does not fall into majority of aesthetic categories and I capture them in photos.

I started teaching Czech to foreign students in the Czech republic an in Ukraine and I fell in love with my mother tongue too. I was trained as a lecturer of Czech language by Czech Centre in Kyiv so apart from the language teaching I can offer you an insight into long Czech history and our rich culture. As a student of Farsi and Italian I can empathize with the needs and struggles of beginners in the language so I always strive to adjust the lesson´s plan and style to individual requirements of students.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
In my opinion, language is a tool of communication so I always aim to tailor my lessons to the needs of students to teach them how to turn theory into practice. Speaking is a vital part of our lives and if you are a beginner I will help you to overcome shyness and teach you how to form sentences even at the very beginning of your learning process. I am also ready to assist you in improving your language skills if you are an advanced student.

We will be speaking a lot from the first lesson! Using what you learned in practise is the best way of improving your language skills.

teacher_info.introduction: I am a professional language teacher. I teach Italian, German, English, Spanish, Russian, French, Dutch, Catalan, Portuguese, Greek, Hindi, Arabic and Esperanto (at different levels). I am specialised in multilingual teaching (up to 10 languages in one course) and I am a certified language examiner for English, Italian, Russian, French, German and Spanish. I have lived and taught in several countries (UK, Russia, Germany, Spain, France, Italy, Switzerland) and hold an MA in International Communication from the University of Modena and Reggio Emilia (Italy), an MA in Didactics from the University of Siena and Perugia (Italy), BAs in Translating and Interpreting from the University of Bologna (Italy) and the University of Grenoble (France), as well as the CELTA (Certification in English Language Teaching to Adults) from the University of Cambridge. I have taught at language schools, universities, international schools and online. I give presentations and lectures about language learning, multilingual teaching and learning and intercultural communication, and also conduct language workshops that enable students to start speaking one or more languages from the very first moment. My approach allows students to have their first conversations in the target language or languages after only a few minutes. I am also a language coach and can help learners to make rapid progress. In addition to my teaching, speaking, and coaching activities, I have also written language learning material and books.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I am an experienced teacher. I have been teaching Italian for four years in Russia, as well as teaching Russian to individual students since 2017.
I’ve been studying foreign languages since forever, therefore I know how stressful that can be, but at the same time very interesting and rewarding. I will show you how amazing can it be to learn new languages, cultures and traditions, as if you were born anew for a second time! At same time I will make you become confident with your language skills, encouraging you to improve them.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I’m ready to teach students from A1 to C2. I know different languages and I'm sure we will find a way to easily communicate. My method will depend on the student's level. For instance, if you’re a beginner we will first concentrate on grammar, but also not neglecting oral practice. We will make grammar exercises, listen to audio recordings and practice as much as we can! If you are an advanced student, we will study idiomatic expressions, proverbs, and difficult grammatical constructions. We will read articles from newspapers, and discuss interesting topics. 
The most important thing is that I will always consider your own interests and goals in this new “language trip” with me.

teacher_info.about_me:
Hello, I am Kseniia and I would be very happy to become your Russian language teacher.
Originally I am from Russia, but at the moment I am living in Germany. I speak Russian, English, German and I am currently learning French.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Up to today I have had an opportunity to teach Russian to the speakers of English, German and French. Even though I speak these languages, but as a teacher I use them in a class as little as possible. I believe that we can truly master a language if we start thinking in it. We will think in it, if we know how to build a sentence, essentially if we know the structure. So my purpose as a teacher is to help you master the structure of Russian language so that you can think in Russian and say anything you want in it.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Frankly speaking, I am a demanding teacher. I pay attention not only to grammar, but also to pronunciation of my students. I want to make sure that my students would be in any situation understood by native speakers and  they would understand native speakers too, no matter accent, tone of voice or the word order in a sentence. That is why I follow a rule: a teacher is there for a student, the teacher always speaks clearly and comprehensively, so that a student is always able to understand him or her. 
Thank you very much for reading! I wish you found a good teacher!

pro_course_detail.title: easy-peasy IELTS/TOEFL/CAE/FCE/KET/PET *preparation course*
pro_course_detail.description:
Do you dream to study abroad? You have never taken any exams before...afraid of your first test of the English language? 
Speaking part brings shivering down the spine and/or Writing is way too complicated...

Stay relaxed and join me with my course ☺️⬇️

The test is nothing to be afraid of! And you will see this during the course ‼️

So how does the course work:

✔️We will take with you lots of mock tests, which will gradually boost your confidence. These mock tests replicate the real exam, so that you will get accustomed to unknown topics and won't be afraid of it. 

✔️ You will be introduced to the structure of the test (all 4 parts). 
It's extremely important to know what to look out for - for you to be fully prepared and not to be scared of what is going to be next after each part.

✔️We will focus on your strong areas to gather courage. 
Making them stronger would emphatically ensure you scoring higher marks in the test.
✔️Each and every person has some weak areas, you are not the only one. We will focus on them right from day 1. As when you start your preparation and develop those areas there will be nothing to be afraid of!

✔️✔️✔️✔️ and a lot more useful advice on how to get rid of fear of the Listening/Reading/ Writing/ Speaking part and become a happy owner of the certificate.

⚠️What you will get from me: 

%General exam technique
%Tips on how to impress the examiner 
%Honest feedback
%Useful advice on how to manage your stress 
%Advice on how to sound natural (Coherence)
%Useful native expressions 
%Pronunciation guidance 
%Grammar guidance  
%Silly mistakes while speaking and how to avoid them 

⚠️What I will need from you:

%Minimum A1/A2 (for KET/PET) or B1 level of English (for IELTS/TOEFL/FCE)!
%Whatever device (cell phone or watch) to keep time 
%❗️Positive attitude and good mood

pro_course_detail.title: Individual English lessons (*All levels)
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is for all students who want to learn/improve their English faster than ever and speak fluent English confidently without being so shy and reserved.
I prepared for you the course with 5 main criteria:

1.Phrases - not individual words (collocations/connected speech)

2. No❌ grammar books and boring/long grammar explanations.  

3. Listen first! 

4. Listen - Answer - Repeat!

5. "Mirror effect" (it will enable you to teach yourself the language) 

+ a lot of useful material to get your English to the next level.

The lessons will be structured and personalised according to your specific needs:
1st - We will set a (realistic) goal.
2nd - Work out a step-by-step plan.
3rd - Focus on your strong areas (trust me you've got at least one :)) to gather courage and make them stronger, which would emphatically ensure your progress in the language learning journey!
4th - Figure out your weak areas right from day 1 and start working on them in a relaxed and pleasant way by *speaking through them.
* Yes, exactly speaking! otherwise English will be detached and you'll feel a disjunction between the language and you! As you cannot study a musical instrument without ever playing it!
In this course English will be taught by speaking 80% of the time!*
So bring your good mood and enthusiasm and let's get our first lesson started!;)

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Speaking Practice (for at least INTERMEDIATE students)
pro_course_detail.description:
Dear student, 
This package is for at least Intermediate level students, who want to improve their speaking skills. So how it works:

pro_course_detail.title: Lessons for Beginner and Intermediate students (A0 - В2)
pro_course_detail.description:
Have you always wanted to learn Russian but didn't know where to start? Do you already know some Russian and wish to improve it? Maybe you started learning it a long time ago but didn't have enough motivation to go on? Or you feel stuck between B1-B2 and don't know how to move on? If you answered 'yes' to any of these questions — this type of lesson is for you! 

This is a structured lesson focusing on learning/reviewing alphabet and reading rules, building the vocabulary and covering essential grammar (for A0-A2) and on building more complex grammar and vocabulary, improving reading and writing skills, and understanding Russian native speech (for B1-B2).

I am happy to offer different tasks: from drilling to creative exercises. I also like to include video/audio tasks and authentic texts in my lessons. Each student has an individual presentation with all the exercises/rules/information/materials covered.

P.S. If you would like to focus on 1-2 particular skills (e.g. only writing), you can book the lesson, but make sure to warn me.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation Practice (А2-С2)
pro_course_detail.description:
Do you learn Russian grammar on your own but feel that you lack the conversation practice? Maybe you wish to learn grammar and vocabulary through communication? Or maybe you are planning to go to Russia soon and want to be able to speak the language? If you answered 'yes' to any of the questions - this type of lesson is for you!

During the lesson, we can talk about a variety of topics. After each lesson, I structure all the topics/words/expressions discussed and analyze your mistakes in your individual presentation.

P.S. If you want to talk about something specific and need me to read/watch a video/article/etc., make sure to warn me and send the materials.

pro_course_detail.title: Everybody Talks / Учимся говорить и разговаривать!
pro_course_detail.description:
Учимся выходить из зоны комфорта и преодолевать языковой барьер, разиваем речевую компетенцию (то есть учимся употреблять правила в спонтанной речи), работаем над произношением, рефлексируем над сказанным, изучаем и закрепляем полезные фразы или просто поддерживаем и повышем ваши разговорные навыки - если вам подходит что-то из этого (или всё сразу), то этот курс для вас! 

Примерный формат занятия: 

1. Определяем тему разговора заранее
2. Разбор полезной лексики и грамматики по теме
3. Рассказ студента с наводящими вопросами от преподавателя либо полноценный диалог 
4. Анализ и структуризация ошибок/дополнительные материалы/домашнее задание (после урока в отдельной презентации)

С радостью привлекаю интерактивный материал (видео, песни и т.д.) для того, чтобы посмотреть и послушать, как говорят носители!

teacher_info.intro: Learning a language through direct dialogue is one of the most effective and natural ways to improve it. Let's begin! ;)
teacher_info.introduction:
Hello, my name is Robert. I'm from Russia. I graduated from Pedagogical College. I have always been interested in discovering other cultures, traveling, music, and movies. I am a native speaker of both Russian and Tatar. I also speak English and I am currently learning Spanish. I have experience giving private lessons in my city. I like to make my lessons easy to understand, for which I have a simple methodology and use dynamic techniques. I believe that learning a language through direct dialogue is one of the most effective and natural ways to improve it. Every new culture and new language you study brings great benefits. Russian and Tatar are unique and beautiful, with both a rich literature and history; around 300 million people speak it worldwide. Russia is also the largest country, with lovely nature, interesting places and friendly people. If you're just starting out, or maybe you want to improve your conversational skills, I'll be happy to help you explore this beautiful and historical language. Thank you for your interest - I look forward to seeing you in my class! 

***
 Здравствуйте! Меня зовут Роберт. Я из России. Я окончил Педагогический колледж. Я всегда интересовался другими культурами и путешествиями. Мои родные языки Русский и Татарский, также я говорю на Английском и изучаю Испанский. Мне нравится делать уроки легкими и доступными для понимания, у меня простая и динамичная методика. Я верю что изучение языка через прямой диалог, является естественным и эффективным способом. Русский уникальный и красивый язык, с богатой литературой и историей, около 300 миллион человек в мире говорят на нем. Россия самая большая страна, с удивительной природой, интересными местами и дружелюбными людьми. Если вы только начинающий или хотите улучшить свои разговорные навыки, я буду рад помочь вам в изучении и исследовании этого прекрасного языка. Спасибо, и жду вас в своем классе!

teacher_info.intro:
・自己紹介・
始めまして。ヴィクトリアと申します。ウクライナ出身です。
ウクライナ語、ロシア語、英語、日本語と韓国語が話せます。
２０１７年にキエフ大学を卒業しました。
大学で日本語を専攻しましたが、日本語だけではなく、英語と韓国語の授業も受けました。
２０１３年に韓国に５ヶ月、２０１５－２０１６年に日本に１年間の留学をしました。

Hello. 
My name is Victoria. I'm Ukrainian.
I can speak Ukrainian, Russian, English, Japanese and Korean languages.
I graduated from Taras Shevchenko National University of Kyiv in 2017 and received a degree as an Expert in Japanese Language and Literature and Translation.
Even though Japanese was my major, in university I studied not only Japanese language, but English and Korean as well.
I've also studied abroad 5 months in Korea in 2013, and 1 year in Japan in 2015-2016.
teacher_info.about_me:
・自己紹介・
始めまして。ヴィクトリアと申します。ウクライナ出身です。
ウクライナ語、ロシア語、英語、日本語と韓国語が話せます。
２０１７年にキエフ大学を卒業しました。
大学で日本語を専攻しましたが、日本語だけではなく、英語と韓国語の授業も受けました。
２０１３年に韓国に５ヶ月、２０１５－２０１６年に日本に１年間の留学をしました。

Hello. 
My name is Victoria. I'm Ukrainian.
I can speak Ukrainian, Russian, English, Japanese and Korean languages.
I graduated from Taras Shevchenko National University of Kyiv in 2017 and received a degree as an Expert in Japanese Language and Literature and Translation.
Even though Japanese was my major, in university I studied not only Japanese language, but English and Korean as well.
I've also studied abroad 5 months in Korea in 2013, and 1 year in Japan in 2015-2016.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I've been working as a teacher for more than 5 years now, and have taught more than 100 students so far. I believe that to be able to use foreign language efficiently, you have to start from the very basics, grow to understand other country's culture, and practice a lot. I also understand that every person is different, and perceives information differently, so I try to be flexible, create individual studying programs, and take into account each student's strong and weak points.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
・レッスンについて・
初心者向けの日本語レッスンとロシア語会話のレッスンをします。レッスンのとき本や動画や画像など様々な教材を使います。学生からの質問はいつも大歓迎です！分からないことや気になることがあったら是非聞いてみてください。

I offer Japanese lessons for beginners and Russian speaking practice for all levels. During my lessons, I try to explain how the language work in the most simple way, using different types of tools, including online whiteboards, screen sharing, painting softwares, and others. If you have any questions about lessons or material you don't understand, you're always welcome to ask as many as you want.

* For Japanese lessons, I usually use Minna no Nihongo (みんなの日本語) textbook, so if you want to use some other books or materials, please let me know in advance.

exp_info.description: I've been teaching languages on Italki for the past two years. I had more than 100 students, and gave more than 800 lessons over the course of working as a tutor. I believe that this experience helped me to put my knowledge into practice and hone my skills as a teacher, and I'm ready to take it to the next level.

edu_info.institution: Taras Shevchenko National University of Kyiv
edu_info.major: Japanese language and literature and translation
edu_info.description: In university I majored in Japanese language, literature and translation, and studied linguistics and methods of teaching foreign languages and literature, as can be seen from my diploma supplement.

cert_info.certificate: Japanese Language Proficiency Test Certificate N1

course_info.trial_description: During the trial lesson with students we usually do: self-introduction, testing the language level, talking about learning goals and discussing the further course of study. For the complete beginners trial lesson can also be used as an introduction to a new language.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Language Informal Tutoring
pro_course_detail.description: Russian language conversational practice. Studying words and expressions for travelling, reading and discussing texts or watching videos in Russian. If you'd like to do some other kind of activity, please message me first before booking the lesson.

pro_course_detail.title: Japanese Lessons (for students who joined me before year 2022)
pro_course_detail.description: Japanese lessons for a discounted price for those of my students who joined me till year 2022. We will follow the usual lessons plan, with some possible changes if requested.

pro_course_detail.title: Japanese for Beginners (with textbooks)
pro_course_detail.description: Japanese language lessons for beginners using Minna no Nihongo, Basic Kanji Book (all studying materials are provided by the teacher). During the lesson, we study and practice new grammar and vocabulary, read texts in Japanese, do exercises and make dialogues. Recommended for those who want to create a strong language base and have a good understanding of Japanese language and culture.

pro_course_detail.title: Ukrainian Language Speaking Practice
pro_course_detail.description: Ukrainian language conversational practice. Studying words and expressions for daily conversation, reading and discussing texts or watching videos in Ukrainian. If you'd like to do some other kind of activity, please message me first before booking the lesson.

teacher_info.intro: Привет! Меня зовут Геннадий. Я учитель русского языка.  My name is Gennady. I am a native Russian speaker. I live in Russia, Samara. I love Russian language and I teach it with great pleasure. My goal is to help people all over the world study Russian language. I like a lot of things including history, literature, culture, and cinema. I am interested in everything what happens in Russia and in the world. Russian language is my native language and I speak it clearly without regional accents. I speak English and I also speak Chinese Mandarin a little bit. 大家好。我叫Gena。我是俄文老师。我会说普通话一点儿。
teacher_info.introduction: I am a teacher of Russian language. I’ve been teaching online for more than six years. I'm a native Russian speaker and provide lessons for all levels of Russian starting with very beginner. My lessons are in English. Russian language is really interesting, expressive and full of sense. Russian language has always been very popular. If you know Russian, you can read, for example, great novels by Tolstoy and Dostostoevsky and admire other wonderful masterpieces of Russian culture in original. From my lessons you can get such skills as - reading ability - grammar - pronunciation - listening - writing - speaking Russian language may seem hard, but it is just challenging. I can help you overcame any difficulty in studying this wonderful language.
teacher_info.about_me: Привет! Меня зовут Геннадий. Я учитель русского языка.  My name is Gennady. I am a native Russian speaker. I live in Russia, Samara. I love Russian language and I teach it with great pleasure. My goal is to help people all over the world study Russian language. I like a lot of things including history, literature, culture, and cinema. I am interested in everything what happens in Russia and in the world. Russian language is my native language and I speak it clearly without regional accents. I speak English and I also speak Chinese Mandarin a little bit. 大家好。我叫Gena。我是俄文老师。我会说普通话一点儿。
teacher_info.about_teacher: I’ve been teaching online for more than 10 years. I give lessons for all levels of Russian starting with very beginner. All my professional experience is connected with teaching. On my view the most important thing in teaching is providing personal approach. As a teacher, I always strive to adapt my course to the students’ needs. I try to organize the lesson according to my students’ level and interests. I think that every lesson must be informative, helpful and fun. I believe that all students are good learners, and after some efforts everyone can learn to speak Russian language really well and even to read Russian literature e.g. novels by Tolstoy and Dostoevsky in original.
teacher_info.teaching_style: On my lessons I provide all sorts of activities from conversations on any topic to fully structured courses. I use textbooks, diagrams, grammar exercise, additional materials like videos, readers, books, stories, songs etc. From my lessons you can get such skills as speaking, grammar, pronunciation, listening and writing. I also try to combine language explanation with some interesting and useful information connected with Russian history and culture.

course_info.trial_description: On my trial lesson students can get the idea of how I teach, get the information of my methods and approach. At the same time I always start teaching on the trial lesson. I try to give my students as much knowledge as possible. Even 30 minutes can be enough to learn something new and useful.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational lessons. Разговорная практика.
pro_course_detail.description:
Давайте говорить по-русски! Я расскажу вам много интересного о России, о её традициях, культуре, истории, отвечу на ваши вопросы, и помогу вам улучшить уровень владения русским языком. 
Conversational lessons are very good choice for those who want to improve their speaking skills. We speak Russian on different topics. There can be any topics like daily routine, school, university, weather, travelling, profession, culture, history, literature, and cinema, etc. In the course of conversation I can correct the student’s speech, explain grammar structure, and introduce some new vocabulary. Sometimes we can even use textbooks and do some exercises if it’s necessary for understanding difficult grammar rules. During these lessons students achieve fluency in speaking, broaden their vocabulary and get confidence in grammar. I also try to make each lesson fun for my students. Поговорим?

pro_course_detail.title: General course of Russian language.
pro_course_detail.description:
General course of Russian language. 
Русская грамматика – трудно? Нет, не трудно – интересно! 
If you want to speak Russian you need to understand grammar, build the vocabulary, and know the Cyrillic alphabet and Russian pronunciation. In other words you need a full course of Russian language. I as a teacher provide such a course which contains grammar, pronunciation, vocabulary listening, speaking and writing. This course can be started from any point, e.g. from the very beginning or from more advanced level, so the course can be adopted to the needs of every student. This course is based on textbooks, grammar exercises, diagrams, stories for reading, videos etc. On my lessons I usually share my screen and explain the material step by step. I also try to give some additional interesting and helpful information about Russian history and culture, customs and life and traditions.

pro_course_detail.title: 初级俄语课程用于中国学生。Начальный курс русского языка для китайских студентов.
pro_course_detail.description:
如果您对俄罗斯和俄文很感兴趣你可以选择这门课。您觉得俄文很难、但是这个课程是很简单的。   你会学习常用的话和简单的语法。
- 俄语单词 -Русские слова
- 对话 - Диалоги
- 唱俄罗斯歌曲- Пение русских песен
- 简单的语法 – Простая грамматика
- 简单有趣 - Просто и весело
